Package com.foodbook.foodbook

Provides the classes necessary to create the android application, "Foodbook".

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BogoPicGen  
EditRecipeActivity This activity is used to change details of a selected recipe.
Fridge Fridge is a collection of User created ingredients.
FridgeActivity This class is an activity class for Ingredients.
FridgeIO This class was made as a suggestion from JDeodorant.
FridgeRemove This class was made as a suggestion from JDeodorant.
GalleryBaseAdapter Adapter for gallery.
ImageConverter The class has methods to achieve the following: 1) Bitmap image to a String.
MakeRecipeActivity A subclass of EditRecipeActivity.
PhotoManager Manages pictures of recipes.
PhotoManagerAddOnly Subclass of PhotoManager.
PhotoManagerViewOnly Subclass of PhotoManager.
PictureContainer This class is used to transfer ArrayList between activities that have "SingleInstance" mode.
Recipe A recipe is a set of instructions that a User can record or save to describe how to prepare a food item.
RecipeBook RecipeBook is a collection of local and downloaded recipes.
RecipeBookActivity This class is an activity class for local recipes.
RecipeBookRecipeID This class was made as a suggestion from JDeodorant.
RecipeDetailsActivity Displays a recipe and its features on screen.
ResultsBook Container for search results.
StringOperations Dealing with common string operations.
TitleBarOverride This class contains the implementation of title bar menu button.
UpdateListView A view in the MVC architecture.
 

Package com.foodbook.foodbook Description

Provides the classes necessary to create the android application, "Foodbook".

The application uses a model-view-controller architecture.
